brand.name: With Romilly
brand.subtitle: Mobile Reflexologist in West London
brand.location: Mobile Reflexology in West and NW London

services.title: Reflexology
services.summary: Deeply relaxing and therapeutic; encourages the body to return to a state of homeostasis and bring you back to optimum health.
services.description: Reflexology is a well-established, non-invasive complementary therapy which is recognised by the NHS and many hospices. It is a deeply relaxing and stress relieving therapy which can help a wide-range of mental and physical conditions as well as aiding detoxification. It is well known to calm the nervous system and boost the immune system. The body's organs, glands and systems are mapped on our feet, hands and face, and by stimulating these reflex points with reflexology it un-blocks any stagnation, restores balance and promotes the body's own healing processes. Reflexology encourages the body to return to a state of homeostasis and brings it back to optimum health. Each treatment promotes the release of endorphins in the body (feel good hormones), improves circulation and boosts mood and wellbeing.
bullets: Stimulates the body's natural healing processes
Calms the nervous system and promotes relaxation

services.title: Facial Reflexology
services.summary: Wonderfully calming for your nervous system; relaxes your mind, reduces tension and rejuvenates skin.
services.description: Facial Reflexology has the same benefits and principles of foot reflexology and due to the face's close proximity to the brain and cranial nerves, it is very powerful in regards to the level of relaxation and the impact on the body's systems. It helps open up neural pathways, helping to reduce stress levels. Each treatment includes a cleanse, hot towel steam and luxury massage. Facial Reflexology boosts circulation, reduces muscle tension and relieves congestion. It releases emotions held in the face, soothing the nervous system to reduce stress and anxiety and has the added benefit of rejuvenating the skin leaving you calm and radiant.
bullets: Deeply relaxing and calms the nervous system
Boosts circulation, improves lymph flow and smooths skin
Reduces muscle tension and emotions held in the face

services.title: Pre-Conceptual & Pregnancy Reflexology
services.summary: Hugely beneficial for your reproductive system; reduces stress, promotes hormonal balance and reduces pregnancy aches and pains.
services.description: One of the major ways that Reflexology helps couples to conceive is by reducing stress and balancing hormones because stress and hormonal imbalances can have a major impact on a couple's chance of conceiving. Pre-conceptual Reflexology helps to create the perfect body ecology for a viable and healthy pregnancy. By stimulating certain reflex points, we help balance the endocrine system (responsible for hormonal health). Reflexology gives your body a re-boot - kick-starting the reproductive system, regulating hormonal functions and aiding detoxification so that you are in the best stead for a successful conception. Throughout your pregnancy, reflexology helps reduce aches and pains and brings balance to your mind and body. Reflexology can be helpful post-partum to re-energise, re-balance and aid healing.
bullets: Helps to balance hormones and reduce stress
Promotes optimal body ecology for a healthy pregnancy
Calms pregnancy aches, pains and morning sickness
notes: Not carried out in the first trimester.

services.title: Zone Face Lift
services.summary: Award-winning holistic facial combining reflexology, Gua Sha and massage techniques for natural lifting.
services.description: The Zone Face Lift facial is an award-winning therapy developed by Ziggie Bergman which has been hailed a credible alternative to Botox. It is a kinder holistic approach to helping you naturally look your best. The results speak for themselves! Each treatment starts with a cleanse, hot towel steam and luxury massage. ZFL combines pressure-point massage, sculpting Gua Sha, along with Native American and Asian massage techniques to gently release emotions held in the face. You will leave the session feeling revived and with a more youthful and 'bright' appearance. Zone Face Lift promotes collagen and elastin production and helps to de-puff the face. It sculpts and smooths your skin, lifts the face and neck, and leaves you feeling deeply relaxed with a truly healthy glow.
bullets: Combines manual massage with other tools to promote a natural lift
Improves lymphatic drainage and skin elasticity
Hailed a credible alternative to botox
Reduces puffiness and tension, releases stress held in face
whoItHelps: Signs of ageing and fine lines

policies.payment: 25% taken at time of booking. 75% balance taken after treatment.
policies.cancellation: -48hrs prior appt: postpone/cancel free of charge. -25hrs prior appt: postpone by 1 week free of charge or 50% cancellation charge. Less than 25hrs prior appt/On the day of appt/no show: 100% cancellation charge.
policies.consultation: Please complete the consultation form before your treatment.
policies.mobile: Mobile reflexology treatments available in West and NW London.
policies.note: Please note: Reflexologists do not give medical diagnosis or treatment but do correct imbalances that are revealed in each session. It is your responsibility to consult your GP about any pain, problem or illness that you are presently aware of, or become alerted to the possibility of as a result of a session.

testimonials.quote: Romilly's treatments are so therapeutic, and I can feel the tension melting away throughout each session. After 4 sessions my symptoms really improved and I felt not only physically rejuvenated but also mentally and emotionally refreshed. Romilly has a remarkable ability to create a soothing atmosphere that instantly puts you at ease and I'd wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking alternative healing, relaxation or stress relief.
testimonials.author: Alexandra S

testimonials.quote: The facial reflexology was incredible. Not only did my skin look radiant, but I felt so calm and centred afterwards.
testimonials.author: Sarah M

testimonials.quote: Romilly helped me so much during my pregnancy. Her gentle approach and expertise made all the difference to my wellbeing.
testimonials.author: Emma T

recommends.name: Hayou Method Bamboo Body Tapper

about.short: I am a qualified Reflexology practitioner and an insured member of the Association of Reflexologists, trained at the prestigious London School of Reflexology. As well as classic Reflexology, I am trained in Pre-Conceptual and Pregnancy Reflexology, Facial Reflexology and holistic Zone Face Lift facials. I also have a diploma in Naturopathy and have a wide knowledge and interest in other complementary therapies and how they can help and heal us in different ways.
about.long: I am a qualified Reflexology practitioner and an insured member of the Association of Reflexologists, trained at the prestigious London School of Reflexology. As well as classic Reflexology, I am trained in Pre-Conceptual and Pregnancy Reflexology, Facial Reflexology and holistic Zone Face Lift facials. I also have a diploma in Naturopathy and have a wide knowledge and interest in other complementary therapies and how they can help and heal us in different ways. I have a particular interest in women's health and how balancing the mind, body and emotions with Reflexology is often exactly what we need to lead a happier and healthier life. I truly believe that our bodies have the ability to heal themselves, with a little nurturing and gentle rebalancing.
qualifications: Qualified Reflexologist, London School of Reflexology
Member of the Association of Reflexologists
Facial Reflexology and Zone Face Lift certified
